History

AMCO is a family enterprise backed with over 50 years of experience in apparel manufacturing and sourcing. The company was initially established in 1969 in Pakistan. Later on as an expansion project, AMCO was established in United Arab Emirates by 1989. Today the third generation of the family has grown the company to showcase a unique mix of high quality apparel for a global vision

AMCO Apparel Factory

Vision

To be a globally prominent apparel manufacturer in terms of quality, service standards and ultimate customer satisfaction.

Mission

AMCO APPAREL MANUFACTURING FZC strives to become a brand of choice by superior quality products, timely delivery and best customer services at competitive prices. We also ensure best labour practices to be socially responsible for all our employees as well as for our economy.

experience

The company has been running successfully since its inception. Currently we have a strength of more than 300 people consisting of professional management and skilled labor in our manufacturing unit. We have a efficient supply chain network with fabric and accessories manufacturers from all over Asia.

300 MAN POWER

About

AMCO Apparel Manufacturing Company is the leading Apparel manufacturing company from United Arab Emirates, near the dynamic city of Dubai.
